overview: Watch 13 of the hottest.. well endowed... sex charged "water-polo" players fight the demanding forces of nature to gain power and win every game to please their competitive coach. One double header filled with incredibly built, hot models, who can keep their hands off each other. Renowned director, Csaba Borbely, with his one-of-a-kind gifted talent, knows how to capture all the explosive erotic energy XXX action required for hit after hit!
title: Water Jocks Part 1: Hard Competition
